headline: A Planted Seed
description: A deeply personal reflection on loss, faith, and transformation. Written in the Pale Moon Full phase, this piece weaves together mourning for a marriage, the desire for a life of spiritual devotion, and the commitment to pursue good despite sorrow. The work is accompanied by a hand-drawn image rich with symbolic detail and biblical exhortations toward sincere love.

motifMap.meaning: Potential for renewal and growth amid darkness
Layers of spiritual and emotional journey
Guidance toward sincere love and moral clarity
Order within chaos, divine structure in human life

associatedMedia.description: Hand-drawn symbolic image featuring a seed-shaped form with concentric patterns, biblical verses, and vibrant colors against a dark background.
